reviewText: This is an excellent made-for-TV film which was made in Canada for the Lifetime network in 2003. Dina Meyer plays Erin, an aspiring actress who acts as a decoy for a detective agency that entraps cheating husbands. She becomes involved with one of the husbands after his divorce, but has a very hard time trusting him now. When bodies start turning up, she and the husband are the only suspects. Can she trust him?
